Plot: When a protective father meets a murderous ex-con, both need to deviate from the path they are on as they soon find themselves entangled in a downwards spiral of lies and violence while having to confront their own inner psyche.
Title: Cold in July
Writer: Nick Damici, Joe R. Lansdale (based on the novel by), Jim Mickle
Actors: Vinessa Shaw, Michael C. Hall, Ken Holmes, Nick Damici
tomatoConsensus: Boasting plenty of twists, a suitably seedy tone, and a memorable supporting turn from Don Johnson, Cold in July proves an uncommonly rewarding thriller.
